name: ax-pr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
comment: The Axiom of Pairing of ZF set theory. It was derived as theorem ~ axpr above and is therefore redundant, but we state it as a separate axiom here so that its uses can be identified more easily. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2006.)
